teaser: How well have you kept up on this week's tech news?
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally! How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

Our guest this week is Marketplace senior reporter Stacey Vanek Smith. Smith stops by for one last game before heading off to join our colleagues at NPR's Planet Money.
description: How well have you kept up on this week's tech news?
title: Silicon Tally: Charlotte's Web...in your Suzuki
